alert.note: Alert for Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 2:41PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Winds through Tuesday... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Winds gusting 40 to 50 mph. Locally higher gusts are possible on Tuesday along the south side of Casper and across the higher elevations and exposed ridge lines of the Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range and Natrona County. * WHEN...Through Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong winds can pose an elevated risk of blow over for light and high profile vehicles. Blowing and drifting snow across roads and other open or exposed areas is expected.

area.areaDesc: Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
